task.title: Building output using the command-line tool
task.shortdesc: If you are unfamiliar with Ant, you can invoke the DITA Open Toolkit (DITA-OT) and build output from the command-line tool.

step.cmd: From the command prompt, issue the following command:

example.p: The following command generates XHTML output for the sequence.ditamap file and specifies the output is written to the test directorydita -Dargs.input=samples/sequence.ditamap -Dout.dir=test -Dtranstype=xhtml
